item.title: Building brilliant managers (including yourself!)
item.description: Session description Too often, we chuck talented technologists into a promotion to the role of team lead or manager without any training or support. This can lead to a shaky foundation in their management style, many new managers quitting to go back to tech, and people being mis-handled as managers learn. In this session, I’ll take you through some of the concepts, frameworks, and support systems I think help a company grow great leaders.
